page.h2: Tools For Connecting Mathematical Software Systems

ul.li: IAMC is a framework for providing Internet Accessible Mathematical Computation which supports OpenMath as a data exchange format
JavaMath is a free API for linking computational engines (in particular Maple and GAP) into Java programs using OpenMath as the data format
Logic Broker Architecture is a framework which provides the infrastructure for making mechanized reasoning systems interoperate, which uses OpenMath as the content language.
MathWeb is a system for connecting mathematical software systems which speak OMDoc via a common software bus.
The OpenMath Worksheet/Dispatcher is a Java application for providing access to OpenMath-based computational services over the internet.
OpenXM is an infrastructure for mathematical communication which will support OpenMath.
